MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW7 postcode area of Winsford, affecting properties in Grange Lane and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:39PM on 4th December 2020.
